item.title: UsmanIsland = NO ANTI-LEECH = MUST SEE = BEST DELTA 317 EVER
item.dc:creator: @Abnant Abnant
item.description:
@Abnant wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:200, topic:365112”][quote author=Abnant link=topic=461314.msg3389049#msg3389049 date=1288741986]
There is no tutorials on how to fix the whole delay. Not a single method is causing it, and I don’t really know what these Pro-Coders is talking about when I read threads where they discuss it. There is none of them who says they have a real solution, though.
[/quote]Can you point me into one of the conversations?[/quote]

That would be advertising other websites. Also, you don’t seem very helpful to me. I’ll keep looking I guess!

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: UsmanIsland = NO ANTI-LEECH = MUST SEE = BEST DELTA 317 EVER
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

ROFL WOW fail antileech dude! That’s the most simple thing you could possibly think of!

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Void { { { { } } } }

Void { { { } } }

End of Class }

Anyone with mediocre knowledge of java coding can understand what I’m saying here. “1:1 or expect 100”

Edit: USMan, if you change the antileech cause I said this, that just shows you just don’t want ANYONE you don’t allow to know about this. If they can understand this, they deserve the source.

item.title: UsmanIsland = NO ANTI-LEECH = MUST SEE = BEST DELTA 317 EVER
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“Abnant, post:197, topic:365112”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=461314.msg3389039#msg3389039 date=1288741298]

I would like to start off by saying the Source is awesome & ive been editing it for the last couple of days. Its just that here is one big flaw as there is on the most Delta servers: The combat system.

I have done alot of research in this, and I can’t see anyone who knows how to fix this. I would like to know if you have ANY idea at all how fix it, or atleast improve it?

Thanks, Abnant.
[/quote]What about the combat system?

What I mean is delays when you attack both NPC’s and Players. Its something about the packets not sending fast enough, causing it to lagg.

I managed to fix a part of the NPC delay, but just like 20% of it. Im not a real coder & I can’t fix this. If you don’t know what I mean, I could post a .gif but I don’t think thats needed.

Example:

I attack a Rock Crab, he runs towards the rock crab, then after 3 seconds he attacks it.

Thanks.[/quote]I don’t really know a fix to that. I think there would be a tutorial on it, though. I’ll keep posted if I find a fix.

Read full topic
item.source: UsmanIsland = NO ANTI-LEECH = MUST SEE = BEST DELTA 317 EVER

item.title: UsmanIsland = NO ANTI-LEECH = MUST SEE = BEST DELTA 317 EVER
item.dc:creator: @Abnant Abnant
item.description:
@Abnant wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:195, topic:365112”][quote author=Abnant link=topic=461314.msg3389037#msg3389037 date=1288741264]
I would like to start off by saying the Source is awesome & ive been editing it for the last couple of days. Its just that here is one big flaw as there is on the most Delta servers: The combat system.

I have done alot of research in this, and I can’t see anyone who knows how to fix this. I would like to know if you have ANY idea at all how fix it, or atleast improve it?

Thanks, Abnant.
[/quote]What about the combat system?[/quote]

What I mean is delays when you attack both NPC’s and Players. Its something about the packets not sending fast enough, causing it to lagg.

I managed to fix a part of the NPC delay, but just like 20% of it. Im not a real coder & I can’t fix this. If you don’t know what I mean, I could post a .gif but I don’t think thats needed.

Example:

I attack a Rock Crab, he runs towards the rock crab, then after 3 seconds he attacks it.

Thanks.

Read full topic
